objects.text:
• Modern Digital Display Interface
• High-Efficiency Design
• Multiple Cycle Options
• Large Capacity for Family Loads

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer & Dryer Set | Modern Smart Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek White Design with Modern Digital Display Interface
• 🔧 Front-Loading Configuration for Easy Access and Enhanced Efficiency
• 📱 Digital LED Display with Multiple Cycle Options and Settings
• ⚙️ Premium Stainless Steel Drum for Durability and Performance
• 🌊 High-Efficiency Design for Lower Water and Energy Consumption
• 🎮 User-Friendly Control Panel with Intuitive Dial Selection
• 🏃 Large Capacity Perfect for Family-Sized Loads
• 🔄 Multiple Wash and Dry Cycles for Various Fabric Types
• 💨 Advanced Ventilation System for Optimal Drying Performance
• 🏷️ Energy Star Compliant for Cost-Effective Operation
• 🛠️ Sturdy Construction with Adjustable Leveling Feet
• ⌚ Time Display and Cycle Status Indicators

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and clean design with a strong emphasis on a contemporary laundry appliance. At the top, a bold two-line headline (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) communicates a premium upgrade message in white text against a dark navy background. Below it, a sleek all-caps tagline (`tagline`) reinforces product performance attributes using a futuristic font. A bulleted feature list (`description`) highlights four key benefits in a simple, easy-to-read format. The product image (`product_image`) is centered at the bottom, adding realism and focus to the banner. The price (`price`) stands out in a large, bold white font enclosed within a blue-toned circular accent. A call-to-action (`cta_background`, `cta`) sits directly below as a rounded dark button inviting engagement.

**Color Palette**:
- Midnight Blue: #2C3E50
- Sky Blue: #3498DB
- Light Blue: #F0F4F8
- Circle Accent Blue: #2980B9
- White: #FFFFFF
- Slate Gray (text): #34495E
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, modern washing and drying machines with a minimalist design. The dominant color is a clean, crisp white (#FFFFFF), symbolizing purity and modernity. The control panel features shades of black (#000000) and dark gray (#2E2E2E), lending a professional and high-tech look. The LED display glows in electric blue (#00BFFF), catching the eye and adding a dynamic contrast. Accents of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) and hints of deep chrome (#4F4F4F) around the knobs enhance the premium feel. The smooth blend of these neutrals with subtle highlights ensures both clarity and elegance, perfect for a tech-driven advertisement banner.
